bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, OCLV Carbon seatstay w/alloy chainstay, Net Molded tapered head tube, BB90 w/Precision Fit sockets, internal control routing, no-cut off-road seatmast, ABP Race, Full Floater, magnesium EVO Link, oversized pivot bearings,

components.description: Bontrager Race Lite Disc wheel system, 28 hole, center lock, tubeless ready
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 25mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
Avid Elixir R hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork and shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
